thread.section_title: LD Mountain Centre Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LD Mountain Centre | www.ldmountaincentre.com | 7 of 107
thread.title: Kevin Snaith
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Kevin Snaith

author: Kevin Snaith
title: Kevin Snaith
text:
All major brands are stocked in the shop. The staff are friendly and knowledgable, and to the best of my knowledge the staff take a great interest in everything outdoors.
I've recently done some shopping from the comfort of my living room on the LD Mountain Centre website. It's very easy to navigate, and I've managed to benefit from great prices, with additional discounts with voucher codes.
